items.title: greg.bowman/api-5893-manual status updates
items.body:
<!-- Please read our guidelines before submitting your first PR https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/platform/engineering/code_review_guidelines.md -->

## Description of change
<!-- Please include a description of the change and context. What would a code reviewer, or a future dev, need to know about this PR in order to understand why this PR is necessary? This could include dependencies introduced, changes in behavior, pointers to more detailed documentation. The description should be more than a link to an issue.  -->
There are upload submissions that need to be moved from success status to vbms or are duplicates that need to be changed to error. A list is provided to team Matsumoto periodically to perform these manual updates. A console utility class was created with this ticket to facilitate this manual process. This will be launched manually from the rails console.

## Original issue(s)
department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team#5893

items.title: Cris.shupp/api 5293 status and size
items.body:
<!-- Please read our guidelines before submitting your first PR https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/platform/engineering/code_review_guidelines.md -->

## Description of change
Records size of benefits intake document multipart file and records length of time spent in a given state.  So if we are in the 'pending' state, and state changes to updated we record the length of time spent in pending.  This is done for all states.

## Original issue(s)
https://vajira.max.gov/browse/API-5293
https://vajira.max.gov/browse/API-5694

## Things to know about this PR

-->

items.title: Greg.bowman/api 4815 update business line rspec tests
items.body:
<!-- Please read our guidelines before submitting your first PR https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/blob/master/platform/engineering/code_review_guidelines.md -->

## Description of change
<!-- Please include a description of the change and context. What would a code reviewer, or a future dev, need to know about this PR in order to understand why this PR is necessary? This could include dependencies introduced, changes in behavior, pointers to more detailed documentation. The description should be more than a link to an issue.  -->
Added businessLine rspec testing.

## Original issue(s)
department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team#4815

## Things to know about this PR
<!--
* Are there additions to a `settings.yml` file? Do they vary by environment?
* Is there a feature flag? What is it?
* Is there some Sentry logging that was added? What alerts are relevant?
* Are there any Prometheus metrics being collected? What Grafana dashboard were they added do?
* Are there Swagger docs that were updated?
* Is there any PII concerns or questions?
-->

<!-- Please describe testing done to verify the changes or any testing planned. -->
These tests were put in place to test GCIO's validations for business line which is currently an optional metadata field. Therefore, the upload succeeds if the key is missing, blank, or is a valid business line code. Valid codes are currently:

CMP = Compensation
PMC = Pension
INS = Insurance
EDU = Education
VRE = VRE
BVA = BVA
FID = Fiduciary

other business lines have been suggested but as of 2/3/21 these are the agreed upon codes.
